productName: HD Complete XF Triple Play
descriptiveInfoValue: Up to 250.0 Mbps download speed. Up to 10.0 Mbps upload speed. Over 260 digital channels. 3 popular phone features.
marketingHighlights: [XFINITY® Internet - Blast!®, Unlimited Nationwide Calling, ? On Demand, No minimum term agreement required., Digital Complete TV with HD-DVR or X1 DVR service included - Over 260 channels, including HBO®, Starz®, Cinemax®, Showtime®, The Movie Channel®, and Sports Entertainment Package, including NFL RedZone®., XFINITY On Demand - Catch up on the latest episodes of TV’s hottest shows and even watch entire past seasons with XFINITY On Demand., XFINITY Internet - Download speeds up to 250 Mbps. The most WiFi coverage for your home. and upload speeds up to 10 Mbps, XFINITY X1 will change the way you experience TV. X1 delivers the simplest, fastest, most complete way to access all your entertainment on all your screens., XFINITY Voice - More ways to connect with friends and family in more places around the world., The XFINITY Customer Commitment: two hour appointment windows seven days a week, 24/7 support and self-service tools, and an automatic $20 credit if we're ever late., Includes Wireless Gateway, up to 3 Additional Outlets, and X1 DVR! A DVR that does it all. Record and watch up to six shows.]
conditions: Offer ends 04/16/18. Restrictions apply. Not available in all areas. New residential customers only. Limited to HD Complete XF Triple Play with Digital Premier, HD-DVR or AnyRoom DVR service, up to 3 Additional Outlets, Wireless Gateway, Blast! Internet and Xfinity Voice Unlimited service. Equipment, installation, taxes and fees, including regulatory recovery fees, Broadcast TV Fee (up to $8/mo.), Regional Sports Fee (up to $6.75/mo.) and other applicable charges extra, and subject to change during and after the promo. After first 12 months, monthly service charge for HD Complete XF Triple Play increases to $224.99 per month for months 13-24. After promo, or if any service is cancelled or downgraded, regular rates apply (subject to change). May not be combined with other offers. TV: Limited Basic service subscription required to receive other levels of service. On Demand selections subject to charge indicated at time of purchase. Not all programming available in all areas. Internet: Actual speeds vary and are not guaranteed. Voice: If there is a power outage or network issue, calling, including calls to 911, may be unavailable. 30-Day Money-Back Guarantee applies to one month's recurring service charge and standard installation up to $500. Call for restrictions and complete details. ©2018 Comcast. All rights reserved.

productName: Preferred Latino Double Play
descriptiveInfoValue: Up to 150.0 Mbps download speed. Up to 5.0 Mbps upload speed. Over 280 digital channels. 2-year agreement required.
marketingHighlights: [XFINITY® Internet - Performance Pro, ? On Demand, 2-year minimum term agreement required. Early termination fee applies if all XFINITY services, except for XFINITY Mobile, are cancelled during the agreement term., Preferred Latino TV - Over 280 channels including 60+ Spanish-language and 220+ English-language channels, with favorite Spanish programming like Telemundo, Discovery en Español, beIN Sports ñ, Univision Deportes and more!, XFINITY On Demand - Catch up on the latest episodes of TV’s hottest shows and even watch entire past seasons with XFINITY On Demand., XFINITY Internet - Download speeds up to 150 Mbps. The most WiFi coverage for your home. and upload speeds up to 5 Mbps, XFINITY X1 will change the way you experience TV. X1 delivers the simplest, fastest, most complete way to access all your entertainment on all your screens., Only XFINITY gives you more to stream on any screen with the XFINITY Stream app, included with XFINITY TV service. Download the XFINITY Stream app or watch online at xfinity.com/stream. and upload speeds up to 5 Mbps, The XFINITY Customer Commitment: two hour appointment windows seven days a week, 24/7 support and self-service tools, and an automatic $20 credit if we're ever late., Pick a Premium for only $5 more per month for 6 months! Limited to Showtime and Starz., X1 DVR - A DVR that does it all. Record and watch up to six shows. Add X1 DVR with HD Technology Fee for only $19.95 more per month!]
conditions: Offer ends 04/16/18. Restrictions apply. Not available in all areas. New residential customers only. Limited to Preferred Latino Double Play with Digital Preferred, TV Latino, and Performance Pro Internet service. 2-year minimum term agreement required. Early termination fee applies if all Xfinity services (except for Xfinity Mobile) are cancelled during the agreement term. Equipment, installation, taxes and fees, Broadcast TV Fee (up to $8/mo.), Regional Sports Fee (up to $6.75/mo.) and other applicable charges extra, and subject to change during and after the promo. Additional outlet service fee applies for multi-room viewing. After first 12 months, the monthly service charge for Preferred Latino Double Play increases to $109.99 per month for months 13-24. Pick a Premium offer not available to customers who previously subscribed to the selected premium or to any packages which include the selected premium. After 6 months, the regular monthly service charge for the selected premium applies. After promo, or if any service is cancelled or downgraded, regular rates apply. Comcast's monthly service charge for Showtime and Starz is $12.00 each (subject to change). Service limited to a single outlet. May not be combined with other offers. TV: Limited Basic service subscription required to receive other levels of service. On Demand selections subject to charge indicated at time of purchase. Not all programming available in all areas. Internet: Actual speeds vary and are not guaranteed. 30-Day Money-Back Guarantee applies to one month’s recurring service charge and standard installation up to $500. Call for restrictions and complete details. ©2018 Comcast. All rights reserved.
